formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'JabberSend' =-
[Synopsis] JabberSend(jabber,screenname,message)
[Description] JabberSend(Jabber,ScreenName,Message) Jabber - Client or transport Asterisk uses to connect to Jabber ScreenName - User Name to message. Message - Message to be sent to the buddy

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:
Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -6,5 +6,5 @@ [Description] JabberSend(Jabber,ScreenName,Message) Jabber - Client or transport Asterisk uses to connect to Jabber - ScreenName - User Name to message. - Message - Message to be sent to the buddy + ScreenName - XMPP/Jabber JID (Name) of recipient + Message - Message to be sent to the budd (UTF8)y
